title: The Countess
description: Bored Countess Katerina has it all; beauty, wealth, intelligence and absolute power over her subjects. When she discovers that she now owns a new handsome slave on one of her innumerable estates she sets out to finally create the perfect lover to satisfy her insatiable desires on her own terms.Enjoy this sizzlingly hot Femdom tale of slavery, CFNM, chastity belts, foot worship and tease and denial set in the time of Czarist Russia.
author: M.V. Gaius
